name: Multi Collagen Protein - Hair, Skin, Joints (40 Single Serving Packets)
description:
Dr. Axe Multi-Collagen Protein:

Dr. Axe Multi Collage Protein Formula is uniquely formulated with 5 Types of Food Source Collagen (Type I,II,III,V and X) - Specifically designed to provide your body with the primary building blocks its needs for:

  • Supports a healthy gut†
  • Supports mobility and flexibility†
  • Supports healthy muscles†
  • Supports healthy bones and joints†
  • Supports a healthy weight while keeping hunger in check†
  • Supports healthy, normal aging†
  • Supports restful sleep†
  • Supports a healthy brain†

-Easy to mix powder can be added to a wide variety of healthy foods and beverages

Most people aren't getting enough collagen from diet alone, so help support the health of bodily tissues and more with Dr. Collagen Multi Collagen Protein.†

ingredients.ingredentDetails: HYDROLYZED BOVINE HIDE COLLAGEN PEPTIDES, FERMENTED EGGSHELL MEMBRANE COLLAGEN, CHICKEN BONE BROTH PROTEIN CONCENTRATE, BACILLUS COAGULANS (2 BILLION CFU), HYDROLYZED FISH COLLAGEN PEPTIDES

directions: Adults mix the contents of this packet with 8 ounces of water or your favorite hot or cold recipe.
warnings: If your are pregnant, nursing, allergic, have a Medical condition or taking any medications, consult a doctor before using this or any other dietary supplement. Do not use if product has been opened or tampered with in any way. Keep out of reach of children.
allrgens: Milk Free,Peanut Free,Shellfish Free,Soy Free,Tree Nut Free,Wheat Free
